stunglyph was a powerful handglyph weapon favored by the Geomancers of Kadar used to stun their enemies.
Zakharan sages were unsure of the exact method used to create these wondrous handglyphs, but believed an ancient precursor to the create soundstaff spell was involved.
When activated a stunglyph discharged a wave of sonic force that blasted anything in its path with powerful magic. The cone of force measured  in length and spread to a width of . Anything caught in this area was hit with an effect similar to the power word, stun spell.
Most stunglyphs had between 2â€”8 charges and could not be recharged.
These items could be found in a variety of shapes and sizes.
